alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:27PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm wind gusts will impact portions of central Big Horn, eastern Musselshell, eastern Yellowstone, Rosebud and Treasure Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms producing strong wind gusts along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Mosby to 15 miles northwest of Lodge Grass. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Gusts over 50 mph have been reported along this line over the past hour. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hardin, Colstrip, Forsyth, Hysham, Custer, Melstone, Lame Deer, Busby, Crow Agency, Rosebud, Musselshell, Pompeys Pillar, Bighorn, Ingomar, Cartersville, St. Xavier, Vananda, Muddy Cluster, Birney Village and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure
